```{r setup}
outDataDir <- "output/analysis_normalization"
```

# Normalizing Data

```{r arguments}
pathCase <- "output/data_generate/saveData_dCase.RDS"
pathCtrl <- "output/data_generate/saveData_dCtrl.RDS"

rmRowEffect <- function(input) {
    input - rowMeans(input)
}

dCase <- readRDS(pathCase)
dCtrl <- readRDS(pathCtrl)
```

Samples were normalized using rmRowEffect() function (Mean centering)

```{r normalizeData}
dCaseN <- rmRowEffect(dCase)
dCtrlN <- rmRowEffect(dCtrl)

# Using predefined outDataDir object to save data
dir.create(outDataDir,recursive=T)
saveRDS(dCaseN,file=file.path(outDataDir,"saveData_dCaseN_rmRowEffect.RDS"))
saveRDS(dCtrlN,file=file.path(outDataDir,"saveData_dCtrlN_rmRowEffect.RDS"))
```
